entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:21 p.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High zero.
